column5: Located near Brenham, in the Texas Hill Country; PermaVista ranch boasts breath-taking grounds, amenities, a full-staff and range of activities. Just over an hour from both Houston and Austin, PermaVista Ranch provides an ideal destination perfect for birthday parties, weddings, corporate retreat and family reunions. Aside from breakfast, other meals can be provided if requested at additional cost. Our chef offers international cuisine with an emphasis on genuine Southern Mexican regional foods.
